Ipopt 3.14.19 DLL build with
- linear solver Mumps 5.8.0 (default)
- linear solver Pardsio from Intel MKL
- Metis 5.2.1
- Ampl Solver Library (ASL) 2024-11-08
- Intel MKL 2024.1 parallel

Includes interfaces to C++, C, Fortran, Java, and AMPL.
org.coinor.ipopt.jar is found in share/java/.

Runtime variant: -MD

Build date: 2025-07-30

Compilers and Runtime Libraries:
Microsoft (R) C/C++ Optimizing Compiler Version 19.43.34810 for x64
